data.text: @wonminseob4 @wonminseob4 Hello 원민섭, we kindly ask you to provide us with the details of the flight you are trying to purchase, so that it can be verified. For confidential reasons, we suggest to send it by direct message. Thank you.

@KampferSeverin @kampferseverin Hello Severin, we are sorry for any inconvenience. If we can assist with some question through this channel, we ask you to provide with your booking code. For confidential reasons we suggest to do it by direct message. Thank you.
@britiburcio @britiburcio Hello, we replied by direct message. Thank you.

@laaariinhaa_ @laaariinhaa_ Olá ʟᴀʀᴀ, lamentamos que a experiência não tenha correspondido às suas expectativas. Caso possamos ser úteis com alguma questão por este canal, pedimos que nos indique o código de reserva por mensagem privada.   
Obrigado.

@kktvcamnews Hello a guy@kktvcamnews, we inform you that we may not offer complimentary upgrades.
If further assistance is needed, please send us your booking reference or e-ticket number by private message. Thank you.

@McMarymckay @mcmarymckay Hello Mary, can you provide us with the case number (2022-...) so that it can be verified? 
For security reasons, we suggest to send it by direct message. Thank you.
@dmadrizl @dmadrizl Hola Dayana, hemos contestado su mensaje directo. Gracias.

@Annelud Hello Anne, we apologize for the delay on our reply and inconvenience caused.
We kindly ask you to send us your booking reference or e-ticket number by private message so e may verify. Thank you.

urls.title: Permitted checked baggage
urls.description: All you need to know about checked baggage and extra checked baggage so you can travel with everything you need and leave nothing behind.

data.text:
@oneofonenotmany @oneofonenotmany Hello, 
We replied to your direct message. Thank you.

@solostwoyouu Hello Jaclyn, we apologize for the delay on our reply which is due to a higher number of requests currently received.
We regret the situation described and kindly ask you to send us your booking reference or e-ticket number by private message. Thank you.
@Mtven_ta_ni_lla @mtven_ta_ni_lla Hola MTVentanilla, hemos contestado por mensaje directo. Gracias.
@MrNunoCarvalho Olá Nuno, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigada.
@gregorious90 Hello gregorious, the masks are no longer mandatory on our flights. If you have any other questions we can help you with, feel free to contact us. Thank you.
@spox31213623 Hello Crypto, we have answered your private message. Thank you.

@ricci_marion Hello Marion,
we apologise for the time taken on your claim process. We are verifying the situation. Therefore, you will be contacted via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@CianoBourke Hi! We deeply regret the situation. We inform you that your case is still under review. We will update you once we have more information available. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

@GhislainVachero Hello Ghislain,
We have already answered to your private message. Thank you
@CoenraadB You're welcome and we thank you for your feedback. 😉
@CoenraadB Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. To better assist you, please DM us the email address linked to the complaint submitted. Thank you in advance.

@lucyinreply Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. You will be contacted by email once the analysis is completed. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@dmslad17 Ainsi et pour plus de renseignements, veuillez vous adresser à l'agence qui s'est occupé de votre dossier. Veuillez noter que vous ne pouvez pas obtenir une double compensation par rapport à la même situation. Nous restons à votre disposition pour toute aide complémentaire. Merci

@dmslad17 Bonsoir! Comme indiqué dans le mail reçu, vous avez fait appel à une société (agence de réclamation) qui a déposé une plainte en votre nom et la situation a été réglée par l'intermédiaire de cette même agence.

@LorettaG_ Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. For compensation purposes and refund of expenses, we kindly request that you submit the following form available on our website - https://t.co/bwFSKNcRTz. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @angelkino89 Hola Angel, lamentamos leer lo que nos comenta y si su experiencia no estado a la altura de sus expectativas en esta ocasión. Proporcionar el mejor servicio es nuestra prioridad. Si necesita de algo más, por favor háganos saber. Seguimos a su disposición por mensaje directo.
@Al87571223 Hi! We deeply regret the delay of your luggage. We have replied via DM. Thank you in advance.

@CeciDeMartino Hello Cecilia, 
We kindly request you to send us the details.
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.
@BararyZiba Hi! We inform you that your flight was cancelled on our website. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

@ckearn2003 @Orbitz We kindly request that you contact them and insist since they are the ones obliged to assist you with your question. Please let us know if you have any other questions. Thank you (2/2)

Since you have purchased your booking through a travel agency, we inform you that it is not possible for TAP to provide you with a refund, since you did not pay for your flights directly to us. (1/2)

data.text:
@AmaAdom14169587 Hello Ama,
We have just replied to your DM.

@GudiecoolPablo @TAP_Portugal Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. You will be contacted very soon. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.
@DavidPardo_96 Hello David, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@michellewelch05 Hi! We have replied to your DM. Thank you in advance.
@MaevaGaye Bonjour! Nous vous remercions pour votre message. N'hésitez pas à revenir vers nous si besoin. Merci d'avance. 😉
@_HRphotography Hello Harrison, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.
@Djyash_official Voltámos a responder. Obrigado.
@Djyash_official Olá Dj Yash, respondemos à sua mensagem direta. Obrigado.
@Guaibasaurus Olá 𝔖𝔞𝔫𝔞𝔱ó𝔯𝔦𝔬, respondemos às suas mensagens diretas. Obrigado.
@CassinariB Bonjour cassinari, une réponse vous a été apportée en message. Merci.
@ZurineAzua Hola Zuriñe, lamentamos la situación. Sus DM han sido contestados. Gracias.

@takamario Hi 高丸 翔英, we are truly sorry for the inconvenience the situation has caused you. Having registered your case/request, we kindly ask you to wait for a reply, by email. All efforts are being made so all cases are analysed and replied to as briefly as possible.
Thank you.
@poptrash1 We have replied by private message. Thank you.
@CuignetE Hello cuignet, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@KatheAvenger @KatheAvenger Olá, pode por favor indicar-nos o código de reserva? Por motivos de confidencialidade sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada.
Obrigada.
@bgoncal2 Respondemos por mensagem privada, Bruno. Obrigado.
@Tatiana70900485 Respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@KiaraKing4444 @Anitta Hello Kiara,
We present our most sincere apologies for any inconveniences caused.
In order to assist you, please provide us the lost luggage claim file reference. 
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

data.text:
@BararyZiba Hello Ziba, 
Since you've made the booking with a travel agency, we kindly ask you to contact them directly in order to request the refund. Thank you.

@Tatiana70900485 Olá, pedimos que nos indique o código da reserva ou o número do bilhete, por favor. Por motivos de confidencialidade de dados, sugerimos que nos envie os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@KesUrban Hello Kes, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@Mia_Canada01 Hello Mia, we have replied by private message. Thank you.

@sarahkunst @WebSummit @TAP_Portugal We regret that you felt discriminated but it is not at all TAP’s policy to do so. If you wish you can expose this issue by completing the following form available on our website - https://t.co/bwFSKNdpJ7. Thank you.

data.text:
@ChenchoTroyan Hola Chencho,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle, debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar antes. Informamos que hemos ya contestado a sus mensajes privados. Gracias

@sarahkunst @WebSummit @TAP_Portugal As already informed the process is random. For that reason, some passengers were allowed to board with their luggage and others not. This information can also be checked on our website using the following link https://t.co/dEYBJDZl33.

data.text: @AlbaVicious Por cuestión de seguridad, le pedimos que haga el envío a través de un mensaje privado. Gracias (2/2)

@AlbaVicious Hola Alba,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar antes. Para que nos sea posible verificar su cuestión, solicitamos que nos indique su código del reclamo. (1/2)
@sarahkunst @WebSummit @TAP_Portugal We apologize once again for the situation reported and reaffirm our position regarding the process. Thank you.

Please note that on flights with a very high seat occupancy rate or on TAP Express flights (Embraer 190 and ATR 72-600 aircraft), it may be necessary to carry your cabin bag as checked luggage (free of charge).

data.text:
@EmilyMattozo Olá Emily, 
Lamentamos a situação reportada.
De forma a verificarmos a situação, indique-nos por favor o código da reserva ou número de bilhete (047-XXXXXXXXXX).   
Por razões de privacidade, sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada.   
Obrigado.
@sarahkunst @WebSummit @TAP_Portugal We hope to see you again soon and provide you with a positive experience. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.

data.text:
@Fernand99953060 Bonsoir Fernandes,
Nous ne pouvons pas prévoir un temps estimé pour la réponse car chaque plainte est unique et doit être bien analysée. 
Nous vous prions de bien vouloir patienter.  
Merci.

@LorettaG_ We always try to offer the best possible service to our passengers, specially when unexpected irregularities happen, and we sincerely regret that you feel that the support provided has not been as expected. Thank you.  272
@LorettaG_ Hello Lory, we sincerely apologize for the situation described and for all the distress and inconvenience it may have caused. 1/2

@CeciDeMartino Hello Cecilia,
We apologize for the reported situation.
Do you still need our assistance?
Please let us know.
Thank you.
@Ms_Briongos Hello Esther, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@Mikie_Lx Olá, respondemos por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@JajaTaylor2022 Hello Joycelyn, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
@GiuseppePeltron Hello Giuseppe, we have replied by private message. Thank you.
